I have had the distinct pleasure of working with Jerry for nearly 20 years.  He is one of the most highly connected people in Southern California.  He has worked with hundreds, if not thousands of entrepreneur’s; you can almost always count on calling Jerry when you are seeking a referral for just about any business service.  He is a powerful person, with heavy influence.  His ability to assess a situation and make a decision is uncanny.  He has the unique strength of talking to people at all levels – from CEOs of Fortune 500 companies to a struggling entrepreneur in a 1-employee storefront.  He is a man of great integrity, knowledge, resources, and connectivity.  His follow-up and follow-through skills are unmatched.  He is an absolute pleasure to know and work with.

summary: Global Business Beyond Borders, LLC. We represent an International Syndicated Investment Trust Fund. A private lender specializing in funding development, construction, Green Energy, mining, movies and associated projects in the United States and throughout the World. Base Level Funding $10 million and above. In addition, we handle Commodities, Diamonds, Gold, Iron Ore and various Petroleum Products. Built two companies from start to successful human resources firms. One was ranked the 10th largest employer in the San Gabriel Valley, with over 12,600 work site employees. Another in 2007 was rank 71st of the fastest growing business in the U.S. by Entrepreneur Magazine. Specialties: Sales & Marketing.
